item.title: By: felixjwpark
item.dc:creator: felixjwpark
item.description: ffs Dan. When the revolution comes...

item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description: Well, taking the cake implies that you can just take the good things in life without being preordained. I think for it to be more apropo, a cake illusion should be in a box that you can't get into but you can put your arm in and try to reach. But the cake has to be JUST out of reach. Still an awesome tea tho.
item.content:encoded: Well, taking the cake implies that you can just take the good things in life without being preordained. I think for it to be more apropo, a cake illusion should be in a box that you can’t get into but you can put your arm in and try to reach. But the cake has to be JUST out of reach. Still an awesome tea tho.
